meta_description: Sharing the history, art, and culture of the Ojai Valley through museum exhibitions, programs, and events. Plan your visit today!
hours_text:
Ojai Valley Visitors Center

Just 90 minutes north of Los Angeles, the community of Ojai, California, is known for its charming boutiques, art galleries, stylish eateries, and wine-tasting rooms. Nestled in a scenic valley that has always attracted those seeking wellness, Ojai is the ideal place to restore, rejuvenate and celebrate the outdoors.

#### At the corner of Ojai Avenue and Blanche Street

The Best Way to Get Around Town: The Ojai Trolley

    PHOTO COURTESY THE CITY OF OJAI

[ ROUTES & SCHEDULES ](https://ojaitrolley.com/183/Routes-Schedules)

The Trolley stops 2 blocks from the Museum & Visitor Center

What's Going on While You’re in Town?

### Follow Us to Find Out!

The Best Way to Get Around Town: The Ojai Trolley

    PHOTO COURTESY THE CITY OF OJAI

[ ROUTES & SCHEDULES ](https://ojaitrolley.com/183/Routes-Schedules)

The Trolley stops 2 blocks from the Museum & Visitor Center

The Best Way to Get Around Town: The Ojai Trolley

    PHOTO COURTESY THE CITY OF OJAI

collections_text:
Welcome to   
Ojai Valley 

Museum

[ PLAN YOUR VISIT ](/museum-info)

Sharing the history, art, and culture of the Ojai Valley through museum exhibitions, programs, and events

If you love the Ojai Valley, and you believe that, especially in challenging times, museums matter. Please support the Ojai Valley Museum with a tax-deductible donation. 

Your donation will help support original exhibitions, programs, and events in 2026. 

[ Click here to donate online ](https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=QZEH8577P5NSA)

Exhibitions & Events

  * ## Every THIRD FRIDAY of the Year

Free admission, sips, snacks, and something special. 

[ More Info ](/events)

  * ## Walking Tour of Historic Ojai

Every Saturday at 10:30 am

[ Click Here ](/walking-tours)

  * ## Women of the Valley exhibition

Exhibition opens January 15 with reception January 16 from 5 - 7 pm

[ Click Here ](/women-of-the-valley-100-years-of-history)

  * ## Town Talks related to the Women of the Valley exhibit

February 1, February 22, & March 15

[ More info ](/town-talks)

  * ## Finding the Sunny Side: Design in California. Then and Now.

Free presentation Wed, Feb 11, 5-6:30pm

[ Click Here ](/findingthesunnyside)

  * ## Free Seminar

Organized by the Ojai Arts Commission

Wednesday, January 28, 3 - 4:30 pm

[ Click Here ](/)
